General.Name: Supra Boga Lestari Tbk
General.Description: PT Supra Boga Lestari Tbk operates supermarkets in Indonesia. Its supermarkets offer meat, poultry, seafood, fruits, and vegetables, as well as other specialty products comprising of organic, gluten free, and dietary products. The company operates its supermarket under the Ranch Market, Farmers Market, The Gourmet, Day2Day, Farmers Family, and Pasarina market names. It operates stores located in various cities in Jabodetabek, Surabaya, Malang, Gresik, Semarang, Dumai, Pekanbaru, Palembang, Balikpapan, Samarinda and Ambon. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Pesanggrahan Raya No. 2, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia, 11610
